name: Personal Portofolio
description: I added also my portofolio if you want to check my code on Github

name: eCommerce Website
description: A responsive eCommerce Front-End Site, all functionality was created by myself: Vanilla JS + jQuery, JSON, HTML, CSS.

name: Slider Movies Spoiler
description: A responsive and static page with a slider with top 10 western movies by IMBD and their spoilers. Pure JavaScript, HTML, CSS.

name: Cart Checkout
description: A simple cart shopping checkout; HTML, CSS, JS. Add/delete products, update total price by total of products and their quantity

name: To Do List
description: A simple to-do-list created with HTML, CSS and pure JS. Add new tasks/ delete selected taks/ mark tasks

name: Current Date/Time
description: A static page that shows every one second the current date and time.

name: Password Generator
description: A simple page that generates four random password by clicking the buttom and selecting the length of them; JavaScript, HTML and CSS.

name: Invoice Generator
description: A simple page that calculates and create an invoice by adding some facilitis to your book for an apartment in the hotel; JS, HTML and CSS.

name: Rock Paper Scissors
description: This is one of my first projects. An old game named Rock-Paper-Scissors created with JavaScript, HTML and CSS.
